title: Pumpkin and feta filo triangles
ingredients: ['250g pumpkin puree', '1 (200g) packet feta, crumbled', '1 egg, beaten', '1 teaspoon salt, or to taste', '1/2 tablespoon crushed red chilli flakes, or to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 packet filo pastry', '75ml olive oil', '1 egg white, beaten']
